name: Enemies Cooperate
description:
This Game Made For Wowie Game Jam.

It Took Me 2 Days To Make It(And Not 4 Days, The Time Of The Game Jam), Beacause I Could'nt.

It's A Game Where You Need To Control The Cat And The Dog, And Use The Help Of The 'AI' To Complete All The Levels.

Check The Artists On Itch.Io:

Pop Shop Packs(Cat)

rmazanek(Dog)

ghostpixxells(Food)

Enjoy!
